page.title: 10FAMILY LIFE, SEAMILL (2)
page.content:
contd.
There she would work on the accounts until midday. She would then collect Andrew. In the afternoon she may go to the supermarket, work in the garden, take the dogs for a walk or do some house work. Late afternoon is spent making tea (evening meal) and spending time with children when they arrive home from school. In the evening she would attend one of the clubs of which she is a member{(flower arranging or {babysitting)}or she may drive the children to clubs and classes which they attend, such as Cubs, Girl Guides, keep fit, chess, youth theatre, etc.
